description: Updates the status of a control set in an Audit Manager assessment.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the assessment.

parameters.name: controlSetId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the control set.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the control set that's being updated.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: The comment that's related to the status update.

nested_items.name: controlSet
nested_items.description: The name of the updated control set that the UpdateAssessmentControlSetStatus API returned.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a plain string format.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the control set.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the control set.

nested_items.name: roles
nested_items.description: The roles that are associated with the control set.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: controls
nested_items.description: The list of controls that's contained with the control set.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the control.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the control.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the control.

nested_items.name: response
nested_items.description: The response of the control.

nested_items.name: comments
nested_items.description: The list of comments that's attached to the control.

nested_items.name: authorName
nested_items.description: The name of the user who authored the comment.

nested_items.name: commentBody
nested_items.description: The body text of a control comment.

nested_items.name: postedDate
nested_items.description: The time when the comment was posted.

nested_items.name: evidenceSources
nested_items.description: The list of data sources for the evidence.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: evidenceCount
nested_items.description: The amount of evidence that's collected for the control.

nested_items.name: assessmentReportEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The amount of evidence in the assessment report.

nested_items.name: delegations
nested_items.description: The delegations that are associated with the control set.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the delegation.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was last updated.

nested_items.name: controlSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control set that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: comment
nested_items.description: The comment that's related to the delegation.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that created the delegation.

nested_items.name: systemEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The total number of evidence objects that are retrieved automatically for the control set.

nested_items.name: manualEvidenceCount
nested_items.description: The total number of evidence objects that are uploaded manually to the control set.
